text: (apage) danduvama æsin dakina e avasthavedi aparadha kala sæma atmayakinma lovehi æti (vastun) siyalla tibunada, eva siyallama (tamanta) vandi vasayen dennata adahas karati! tavada tamange læjjava sangava gannatada adahas karati! (edinadi) evata sadharanavama viniscaya denu læbe. (anu pramanayakin ho) evata asadharanayak karanu nolabayi
